title: Linear Search: Find Index
description: Implement a function `linearSearch(arr, target)` that returns the index of the first occurrence of `target` in `arr`, or -1 if not found.

easy: Line 2: for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
medium: Loop through each index from 0 to array length
At each index, compare arr[i] with target
If they match, return the current index
If loop completes without finding, return -1
hard: Think about how to check every element sequentially
What should you return when you find the target?
What should you return if you never find it?
